text: Moi manu hisab te he kotha koi ase kelemane apuni khan bujhi bole komjur ase. Kelemane jineka apnikhan poila te niyom namana laga noukar hoi kene thakise, aru bisi biya hoijai thakise, thik etu nisena, etiya to apuni laga gaw to dharmikta laga noukar hobole dibi, etu pora gaw to pobitro hoi jabo.
